message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know if you're interested!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not able to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,500. This is a fair price for both of us, and it reflects the value of the product. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit below that. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
